fields.description:

And this caused ZKFC timeout (hostname replaced as *):
{code}
2016-05-26 20:17:42,634 WARN org.apache.hadoop.ha.HealthMonitor: Transport-level exception trying to monitor health of NameNode at */10.103.108.200:8030: Call From */10.103.108.13 to *:8030 failed on socket timeout exception: java.net.SocketTimeoutException: 360000 millis timeout while waiting for channel to be ready for read. ch : java.nio.channels.SocketChannel[connected local=/10.103.108.200:51433 remote=*/10.103.108.200:8030]; For more details see:  http://wiki.apache.org/hadoop/SocketTimeout
{code}

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.summary: Stop decommission a rack of DataNodes caused NameNode fail over to standby
